content: A new proposal has been announced #301. It will be brought up at the next meeting.
@T-compiler: Proposal #301 has been seconded, and will be approved in 10 days if no objections are raised.
I like the idea of also making it more ergonomic to compare against a particular def_id
@Nathan Corbyn one thing I would add -- I think you should also document the various kinds of "lang items" in rustc-dev-guide :)
(I've seen now we have things like "documentation items" too..? I forget.)
but basically saying what a lang item is, how it's used, etc
Ah! I forgot to mention that - definitely agree
Should I tack that on the end of the MCP?
used by rustc and clippy lints so we don't have to refer to things by path
yeah. it'd be good to document those. I'm not really clear on what the difference is =) presumably more just a difference of intent...

Nathan Corbyn said:

Should I tack that on the end of the MCP?

doesn't hurt but also not really necessary in my view :)
